description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for the 'Assigned Deliveries' screen in a delivery app. It includes layout components, themed decoration, and placeholders for list content, map/navigation, and contact actions.

classes.name: DeliveryAssignedDeliveriesScreen
classes.description: Main widget for displaying the assigned deliveries screen with a header and placeholder list items.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Private widget for rendering the styled header section with icon and title.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: Private widget representing a styled row containing an icon and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the respective widget.
